channel.title: Gauntlet Con Registration Coming Up - Important Things to Remember
channel.description:
Hey all - Gauntlet Con 2019 registration is coming up. Here's some important things to remember.
If you don't complete both steps, you'll risk not being confirmed as an attendee for registration on Sept. 28.
1. You must be a [Gauntlet Patreon Supporter](https://www.patreon.com/gauntlet) by end of day tomorrow ([date=2019-09-23 timezone="America/New_York"])! 2. You must log into the [Gauntlet Con registration site](http://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/events) by noon Eastern (NYC/Toronto) on [date=2019-09-28 time=12:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]. *Unless you are a guest or GM, please do this even if you had an existing account from last year.* 3. Once you've completed these steps, you should be able to complete registration on [date=2019-09-28 time=17:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"].
Please know there's nothing manual about this process. Your accounts on the registration site have to be created by you, and we can't confirm you as an attendee until after you log in. We have to do the confirmations manually for each individual, so that's why we need your help in completing both steps before the deadlines above.
Thank you!
Richard

@atwoow wrote:

Great, thanks so much, Richard!

item.title: Gauntlet Con Registration Coming Up - Important Things to Remember
item.dc:creator: @atwoow
item.description:
@atwoow wrote:

Shoot, it looks like I misread the Patreon notice from a few days ago. I thought it said you couldn’t subscribe until noon yesterday, but above it says you have to have subscribed by noon yesterday. Is that true and the registration is closed? It’s strange. I am logged into the Firebase app, but each event still says I need to subscribe to RSVP. I can’t figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Gauntlet Con Registration Coming Up - Important Things to Remember
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Just a reminder that if you are a Patreon supporter as of today and want to do Day 1 of Registration for Gauntlet Con this year, please be sure to do these steps:

  1. You must log into the Gauntlet Con registration site by noon Eastern (NYC/Toronto) on 2019-09-28T16:00:00Z. Unless you are a guest or GM, please do this even if you had an existing account from last year.
  2. Once you’ve completed these steps, you should be able to complete registration on 2019-09-28T21:00:00Z.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Con Registration Coming Up - Important Things to Remember

item.title: Gauntlet Con Registration Coming Up - Important Things to Remember
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Hey all - Gauntlet Con 2019 registration is coming up. Here’s some important things to remember.

If you don’t complete both steps, you’ll risk not being confirmed as an attendee for registration on Sept. 28.

  1. You must be a Gauntlet Patreon Supporter by end of day tomorrow (2019-09-23T04:00:00Z)!
  2. You must log into the Gauntlet Con registration site by noon Eastern (NYC/Toronto) on 2019-09-28T16:00:00Z. Unless you are a guest or GM, please do this even if you had an existing account from last year.
  3. Once you’ve completed these steps, you should be able to complete registration on 2019-09-28T21:00:00Z.

Please know there’s nothing manual about this process. Your accounts on the registration site have to be created by you, and we can’t confirm you as an attendee until after you log in. We have to do the confirmations manually for each individual, so that’s why we need your help in completing both steps before the deadlines above.

Thank you!

Richard

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Con Registration Coming Up - Important Things to Remember
